categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File (2014)

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File (2014)
The Official Star Wars Fact File is a series of magazines published by De Agostini, consisting of 120 issues. Its format is similar to the original series that ran from 2002 to 2005.

The new series' initial run started in April 2013 and lasted for five issues, released weekly. The second run that launched in January 2014, with 120 issues planned to be released each Wednesday, differs from the previous run in arrangement, layout, image choice, and coding system. Its issues cover material from Star Wars canon that has been released since the original magazine ended in 2005, including Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, and the Star Wars Rebels TV series.

The Star Wars Fact File is an amazing new work of reference for the world of Star Wars. Every week, collect a new set of files to store in your binders, building into the largest and most complete Star Wars guide ever published.
The content of each issue is split into six categories:
